item.title: Use Velero to configure kubernetes cluster backup strategy
item.author: wzdushu@gmail.com (wanzi)
item.description: Backup is something that every Internet company technician has to do, and of course we are no exception. Today I mainly formulate some of my own strategies for the production environment kubernetes cluster, and share them with you here. The purpose of my kubernetes backup here is mainly to prevent the following situations: Prevent accidental deletion of a namespace in the cluster Prevent accidental operation from causing an abnormality in
